sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_sg_button_instance</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sys_sg_button_instance">button.type=spannable_rating^ORbutton.type=select_one_rating^EQ<item display_value="Spannable Rating" endquery="false" field="button.type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="spannable_rating"/> <item display_value="Select One Rating" endquery="false" field="button.type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="true" value="select_one_rating"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Populate rating field id</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var uiParamGR = new GlideRecord('sys_sg_ui_parameter');
// if virtual field value is true, ui parameter is receiving value from virtual field uiParamGR.addEncodedQuery('button='+current.button+'^input_source=user^virtual_field_value=true'); uiParamGR.query();
if (uiParamGR.next()) { var fieldGR = new GlideRecord('sys_sg_screen_field'); fieldGR.addQuery('type', current.button.type); fieldGR.addQuery('screen', current.parent); fieldGR.query();
if (fieldGR.next()) { fieldGR.setValue('field_name', uiParamGR.getUniqueValue()); fieldGR.update(); } }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-08-20 21:39:54</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>2155b27073321010f20856f77bf6a7fd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Populate rating field id</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Mobile plugin" source="com.glide.sg">2b3434a83c31311068bcf327dfe37fa3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_2155b27073321010f20856f77bf6a7fd</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-09-16 04:16:45</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>async</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2155b27073321010f20856f77bf6a7fd"/> </record_update>
